name: Nolenopo
description:
Nolenopo is a blocky game where you are in the darkness, and you must survive zombies that come at you.

Currently, the project is on hold, and will likely be canceled due to the way it was coded being too complicated too add updates, but a second Nolenopo game is currently in development.

Nolenopo has 5 items and 5 levels. This is my first game, so it is glitchy and not the best, but somehow people who play it find it fun. It only works on some computers 

Join our Discord at https://discord.gg/arfTA8R - View a gameplay video at (fanmade)
